properties.name: header
properties.description: User can bind title for accordion tab.

properties.name: expanded
properties.description: Pane will expand or collapse based on the boolean.

properties.name: footer
properties.description: User can enable footer of card by setting this flag to true.

properties.name: header-align
properties.description: Align of item elements inside card header example : right,center,left.

properties.name: footer-align
properties.description: Align of item elements inside card footer example : right,center,left.
